og.description: Hillary Clinton said she will turn over to the Justice Department her private email server along with a flash drive containing all work-related emails
og.title: Hillary Will Hand Over Email Server, FDA Concerned About Kardashian Instagram, Cop Who Killed Christian Taylor Fired: A.M. Links

twitter.description:
Hillary Clinton said she will turn over to the Justice Department her private email server along with a flash drive containing all work-related emails from her time as Secretary of State. 
Arlington, Texas, police officer Brad Miller was fired Tuesday
